item.description:
Come speak German with us! Sie sind eingeladen! It is the one year Geburtstag of our group so come celebrate with us! What better way to have a birthday party than with a chocolate tasting?Also a game called "The Mystery German". Everyone- newer and those who haven't been in a while- is invited.
(We shouldn't offend the restaurant but... if anyone who wants to participate could bring a bit of some interesting chocolates to share, dass ware toll.) Wir machen wirklich Spass.
Wir werden wahrscheinlich eine sehr interessante Mischung haben!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for flags and people who sound funny
item.name: West Hartford German Kaffeeklatsch one-year birthday party
